law.text: Any person who willfully violates any rule, regulation, subpoena, or order of the commissioner or any provision of this code shall be subject to suspension or revocation of certificate of authority or license, or administrative fine or both.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 929, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 93, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 320, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 301, subtit. 2, sec. 14, effective June 18, 1970.
